titleInfo.title: Performance - Top Floor students at Nashville's Stratford High School - 2018-06-29

mods.abstract: Performance by the Top Floor Students from Nashville's Stratford High School from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on July 29, 2018. Program moderator is Ruby Amanfu. A partnership between the Martha O'Bryan Center and the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum.
